title: I can't post a fucking support ticket because there are no options for Language!
body: It says I have to select a language but there is no fucking option for it, just a fucking dash!

replies.body:
Weeeeell that's no good. It looks like you've been able to submit tickets in the past, so let's try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that can 'refresh' that form. If that doesn't help, you might be able to get it to work correctly by switching browsers to create the ticket. 

Let me know if you were able to get that ticket in!
